description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Demons have kidnapped your princess! Battle hordes of monsters, forge your hero, rescue the princesses and bring peace to the kingdoms. Four champions each with their own agenda, infinite dungeons and multiple endings make Dungeon Smash an intense experience you'll want to share. This is the 4-player-co-op-twin-stick-shooter-fantasy-RPG you've been waiting for. Be a champion! Smash the dungeon!
